paragraphs: o   Boil dandelion greens until tender, then drain.
o   Toss greens with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.

paragraphs: o   Bring chicken broth to a boil.
o   Add mushrooms, bamboo shoots, tofu, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and chili paste.
o   Mix cornstarch with water and add to the soup, stirring until thickened.
o   Beat egg and slowly pour into the soup, stirring constantly.
o   Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.
sentences: Ingredients : o   4 cups chicken broth o   1/2 cup sliced mushrooms o   1/4 cup bamboo shoots o   1/4 cup tofu o   2 tablespoons soy sauce o   2 tablespoons rice vinegar o   1 tablespoon cornstarch o   1 teaspoon chili paste o   1 egg o   1/4 cup chopped green onions Instructions : o   Bring chicken broth to a boil.
o   Add mushrooms, bamboo shoots, tofu, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and chili paste.
o   Mix cornstarch with water and add to the soup, stirring until thickened.
o   Beat egg and slowly pour into the soup, stirring constantly.
o   Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

paragraphs: o   Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor.
o   Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth.
o   Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

o   Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor.
o   Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth.
o   Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

o   Add spinach and cook until wilted.

paragraphs: o   Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o   Cut in cold butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.

o   Roll out dough and cut into circles.
o   Fry in hot oil until golden.

paragraphs: o   Saute diced onion and minced garlic in vegetable oil until softened.
o   Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook
o   Stir in rice and cook for 2 minutes.
o   Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
o   Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender.
sentences: Ingredients : o   2 cups rice o   1 small onion o   2 cloves garlic o   4 tomatoes o   1/4 cup tomato paste o   1/4 cup vegetable oil o   1 teaspoon thyme o   1 teaspoon curry powder o   1 teaspoon salt o   1/2 teaspoon pepper o   4 cups chicken broth Instructions : o   Saute diced onion and minced garlic in vegetable oil until softened.
o   Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook for 5 minutes.
o   Stir in rice and cook for 2 minutes.
o   Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
o   Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender.
o   Serve warm.

paragraphs: o   Mix flour, milk, beaten eggs, salt, and nutmeg to form a batter.
o   Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water.
o   Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain.
o   Saute sliced onion in butter until golden.
o   Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sauteed onion.
o   Bake at 350F (175C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted.
sentences: Ingredients : o   2 cups flour o   1/2 cup milk o   3 eggs o   1 teaspoon salt o   1/4 teaspoon nutmeg o   1/4 cup butter o   1 cup grated cheese o   1 small onion Instructions : o   Mix flour, milk, beaten eggs, salt, and nutmeg to form a batter.
o   Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water.
o   Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain.
o   Saute sliced onion in butter until golden.
o   Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sauteed onion.
o   Bake at 350F (175C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted.
o   Serve warm.

paragraphs: o   Cut cabbage into quarters and soak in salted water for 2 hours.

o   Rub mixture onto cabbage leaves.

sentences: Ingredients : o   1 napa cabbage o   1/4 cup sea salt o   1 tablespoon sugar o   2 tablespoons fish sauce o   2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean chili powder) o   4 cloves garlic o   1 inch ginger
4 green onions Instructions : o   Cut cabbage into quarters and soak in salted water for 2 hours.
o   Rinse and drain cabbage.
o   Mix sugar, fish sauce, gochugaru, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped green onions in a bowl.
o   Rub mixture onto cabbage leaves.
o   Pack cabbage into a jar and let ferment at room temperature for 2-3 days.
o   Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

paragraphs: o   Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.

o   Spread za'atar mixed with olive oil on top.
o   Bake at 400F (200C) for 10-12 minutes until golden.

o   Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o   Spread za'atar mixed with olive oil on top.

sentences: Ingredients : o   2 cups tapioca flour o   1 cup milk o   1/2 cup butter o   1 teaspoon salt o   1 cup grated Parmesan cheese o   2 eggs Instructions :
o   Preheat oven to 375F (190C).
o   Heat milk, butter, and salt in a saucepan until boiling.
o   Remove from heat and stir in tapioca flour until smooth.
o   Let cool slightly, then mix in grated cheese and beaten eggs.
o   Form dough into balls and place on a baking sheet.
o   Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden.
o   Serve warm.

o   Add broccoli and cooked chicken, stir-fry until heated through.

o   Saute sliced chicken in vegetable oil until cooked, then set aside.
o   Scramble eggs in the same pan.

o   Add broccoli and cooked chicken, stir-fry until heated through.
